description: This is a request to solicit arrangements for Supply Arrangements (SAs) for the provision of Heavy Civil Engineering Services in the Atlantic Region.
full_summary:
================================

**RFSA - Refresh C for Heavy Civil Engineering Services**
--------------------------------------------------------

### Reference Number

Reference Number: WS3775236135, Alteration No.: 3

### Solicitation Number

Solicitation Number: WS3775236135

### Tendering Status

This procurement is closed, following the tender closing date on February 22, 2023, at 14:00.

### Procurement Category

Category: SRV

### Notice Type

Notice Type: Request for Supply Arrangement

### Procurement Method

Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding

### Trade Agreements

The procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Panama Trade Agreement
* WTO Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Colombia Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Korea Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

### Tender Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada invites suppliers to submit a proposal for a Supply Arrangement for Heavy Civil Engineering Services in the Atlantic Region. The procurement includes the following geographic locations:

* Nova Scotia
* New Brunswick
* Prince Edward Island
* Newfoundland and Labrador

The supply arrangement will be used for projects located in Atlantic Canada, excluding areas subject to comprehensive land claim agreements.

### Mandatory and Rated Requirements

Evaluation of the submissions will include both Mandatory (M) and Rated (R) Requirements as specified in the RFSA.

### Interested Suppliers

All interested suppliers are invited to participate in this opportunity to become qualified suppliers. Suppliers may choose one or more geographic regions for which they intend to provide services.

### Requested Specialty Services

Suppliers are requested to indicate at least one Specialty Service for which they intention to qualify. Suppliers may choose one or more specialty services.

### Submission Requirements

 Suppliers must submit their proposals through the online portal. Evaluation of submissions will be conducted in accordance with the RFSA document and evaluation criteria.

### Contract Information

Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

Contact Information: [rachel.miller@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:rachel.m
